name: lualu
description:
It's a mini adventure game, with different things behind each door that you push open.

This is a horror type exploration game. When you open your eyes, you are in an abandoned hospital, and you open the door. Behind the door, there are unknown things. Is it a weapon or an enemy? Or a trap? Where is the way out? But what you have to do now is to look for weapons and kill the coming enemies!

Operation mode

Right click the target

WASD controls motion

Left mouse button attack

Mouse control direction

E loading weapons
